EmailTemplate.subject: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, join us for a look at upcoming updates to BigCommerce
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join us for the August BigCommerce Town Hall. During this month's conversation, BigCommerce CEO Brent Bellm and the Product Team will give you a detailed look at the lastest product updates. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Join us for the September BigCommerce Town Hall <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/09-2016-Town-Hall-Registration-Page.html]]>. During this month's conversation, BigCommerce CEO Brent Bellm and the Product Team will give you a detailed look at:
- Apple Pay - eBay Integration - Optimized single page checkout updates - Stencil theme platform updates - New functionality for "View Products" - Cart-level discounts updates
If you have questions about new features, BigCommerce leaders’ perspective on market trends, or comments about the industry you’d like to discuss — this is the webinar for you! We hope to bring you candid insights into BigCommerce and have an open dialogue about the future of our platform. BigCommerce Town Hall <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/09-2016-Town-Hall-Registration-Page.html]]> When: Thursday, September 29, 2016 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM CDT What: A discussion of BigCommerce news and a look at upcoming product enhancements, followed by live Q&A. Presenters: CEO Brent Bellm and the BigCommerce Product Team
Reserve your spot <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/09-2016-Town-Hall-Registration-Page.html]]> If you’re unable to join us, don’t worry — we’ll record each Town Hall and post the video in the Community <[[https://forum.bigcommerce.com/s/article/BigCommerce-Town-Halls?t=1461271876897]]> and Partner Portal. Hope to see you there, The BigCommerce Team
